attacks.name: Splashing Dodge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.text: Attacks used by this Pokémon do 50 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon that has an Ability (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shocking Web
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Lightning Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Add On
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: United Wings
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile that has the United Wings attack.

attacks.name: Stock Up on Feathers
attacks.text: Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Power Shot
attacks.text: Discard a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand. If you can't, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Wood Hammer
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Snarl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do 100 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Suction
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Anachronism Repulsor
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Ancient Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hold Still
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Call for Backup
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: King's Order
attacks.text: Put up to 3 Water Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Beset
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Hail Claw
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Accelerator Flash
attacks.text: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Shattering Speed
attacks.text: Discard this Pokémon and all attached cards.

attacks.name: Eerie Gaze
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals their hand.

attacks.name: Daydream
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if they attach an Energy card from their hand to the Defending Pokémon, their turn ends.

attacks.name: Come and Get You
attacks.text: Put up to 3 Duskull from your discard pile onto your Bench.

abilities.name: Cursed Blast
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may put 5 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If you use this Ability, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

abilities.name: Cursed Blast
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may put 13 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. If you use this Ability, this Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Shadow Bind
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Healing Pirouette
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crescent Purge
attacks.text: You may turn 1 of your face-down Prize cards face up. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage. (That Prize card remains face up for the rest of the game.)

attacks.name: Mystical Return
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Shuffle that Pokémon and all attached cards into their deck.

attacks.name: Disarming Voice
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Clean Hit
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 90 more damage.

abilities.name: Battle-Hardened
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic Fighting Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mad Bite
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Iron Smasher
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Future Pokémon in play, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Smashing Wing
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Pitch-Black Blade
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Shadowy Envoy
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if you played Janine's Secret Art from your hand this turn, you may draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Poison Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1.

attacks.name: Darkfall
attacks.text: If you have at least 3 Darkness Energy in play, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Illusory Hijacking
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each of your opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V in play.

attacks.name: Mischievous Tentacles
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your opponent's deck. You may have your opponent shuffle their deck.

attacks.name: Colluding Tentacles
attacks.text: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot. If you do, this attack does 120 damage to the new Active Pokémon. If you didn't play Xerosic's Machinations from your hand during this turn, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Corrosive Winds
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Destructive Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poisonous Musculature
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Darkness Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, this Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Chain-Crazed
attacks.text: If this Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 130 more damage.

abilities.name: Oh No You Don't
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, and if you have any Pecharunt ex in play, your opponent takes 1 fewer Prize card.

attacks.name: Dirty Headbutt
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Dirty Headbutt.

abilities.name: Flip the Script
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may draw 3 cards. You can't use more than 1 Flip the Script Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Cruel Arrow
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Subjugating Chains
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may switch 1 of your Benched Darkness Pokémon, except any Pecharunt ex, with your Active Pokémon. If you do, the new Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. You can't use more than 1 Subjugating Chains Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Irritated Outburst
attacks.text: This attack does 60 damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.name: ACE Nullifier
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, your opponent can't play any ACE SPEC cards from their hand.

abilities.name: Massive Body
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't play any Stadium cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Nasal Lariat
attacks.text: You may do 100 more damage. If you do, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Rigidify
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Pulse
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck.

attacks.name: Bring Down the Axe
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, it is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Dragon Pulse
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

abilities.name: Plasma Bane
abilities.text: If your opponent has any cards in their discard pile that have "Colress" in the name, this Pokémon can use the Trifrost attack for Colorless.

attacks.name: Trifrost
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 110 damage to 3 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Colorful Catch
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Energy cards of different types, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Power Charger
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Academy at Night
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may put a card from their hand on top of their deck.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Binding Mochi
rules: Attacks used by the Poisoned Pokémon this card is attached to do 40 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Cassiopeia
rules: You can use this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Colress's Tenacity
rules: Search your deck for a Stadium card and an Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Dangerous Laser
rules: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Janine's Secret Art
rules: Choose up to 2 of your Darkness Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Basic Darkness Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. If you attached Energy to your Active Pokémon in this way, it is now Poisoned.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Neutralization Zone
rules: Prevent all damage done to Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box (both yours and your opponent's) by attacks from the opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)This card can't be put into your hand or deck from the discard pile.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Night Stretcher
rules: Put a Pokémon or a Basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Poké Vital A
rules: Heal 150 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.This card can't be put into your hand or deck from the discard pile.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Powerglass
rules: At the end of your turn (after your attack), if the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot, you may attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to it.

name: Xerosic's Machinations
rules: Your opponent discards cards from their hand until they have 3 cards in their hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

attacks.name: Wood Hammer
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do 100 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Adrena-Brain
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached, you may move up to 3 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Adrena-Pheromone
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached and is damaged by an attack, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that damage.

attacks.name: Energy Feather
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Adrena-Power
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached, it gets +100 HP, and the attacks it uses do 100 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

rules: You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
